attributes.action: Gps to start face to face consultations
attributes.additional_details:
So many people have other health conditions other than Covid where their life is seriously affected due to not getting proper one on one medical assistance!

We pay our taxes for this ,service needs to go back to normal.

Can visit a dentist,go on holiday,go clubbing but can’t see your gp?!
attributes.background: Restart doctor face to face surgery’s.
